title: As Told by Things
description: Ordinary objects. Extraordinary tales.As Told by Things is a lighthearted, multi-genre collection of short stories and flash fiction, each told from the perspective of an inanimate object.Fun, witty, and full of charm, As Told by Things will capture your imaginationâ€”as well as your heart.What objects do you think have stories to tell?
author: E.D.E. Bell
